residual.translation[0].definitions[0].d: remaining after a process, event etc is finished
residual.translation[0].definitions[0].n: residual income (=the money left from what you earn after you have paid your taxes)
residual.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the residual effects of drug treatment
residual.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the amount of money or assets left after all taxes or other necessary payments have been made
residual.translation[1].definitions[0].e: the right to any residual assets on the liquidation of the company
residual.translation[1].definitions[1].d: money that someone gets because work that they did previously continues to produce income, for example money that a writer or actor gets when their work is broadcast again
